title: Person of Interest - Elias kills the Voice (05x09)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: Elias was a criminal, but he had rules. There are rules and regulations, He and his people follow. The more you see Elias the more you realize he is a decent dude. He just has to do unsavory things on occasion.
Elias, my favorite villain of all time

Harold's dark turn was so fascinating. Would have been even better with more episodes. Man, Michael Emerson can be chilling when it does absolutely nothing with his face and just stares straight ahead

"I think that's far enough, don't you?"

For me that was the "Crowning Moment Of Awesome" for Elias. :)
Some many people mistake Elias for a villain. There’s a difference between a villain and a criminal. Elias is a criminal but he’s part of the team Machine which makes him a dark hero.
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 9
